message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you considering me. I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for it.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $11,500 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings. What do you think?
